mapper.insert: insert into relay (relay_id, startdate, enddate, title, age, cover) values (seq_relay.nextval, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{title}, #{age}, UTL_RAW.CAST_TO_RAW(#{cover}))
mapper.update: update relay set is_end = 1 where relay_id = #{relayId} and current_date >= enddate and TO_CHAR(current_date, 'HH24') >= '23' and is_end = 0
mapper.select: SELECT relay_id as relayId, startdate, enddate, title, age, TO_CHAR(cover), is_end as isEnd FROM relay ORDER BY startdate DESC
